body.value:
PROGRAMMING EXPERIENCE!

Programming environments are not usually my forte, on the contrary, I constantly try to avoid approaching them.

However, I cannot ignore how important the world of programming is for contemporary society, and especially for people like me, who use devices and applications every day to continue with their lives. Programming is often hostile terrain, but its benefits are incalculable.
body.processed:
PROGRAMMING EXPERIENCE!

Programming environments are not usually my forte, on the contrary, I constantly try to avoid approaching them.

However, I cannot ignore how important the world of programming is for contemporary society, and especially for people like me, who use devices and applications every day to continue with their lives. Programming is often hostile terrain, but its benefits are incalculable.
